body.name: Sensyne 60" Phone Tripod, Lightweight All in One Selfie Stick Integrated with Wireless Remote Compatible with All Cell Phones for Selfie/Video Recording/Photo/Live Stream/Vlog（White）

features: Versatile and Portable All-in-One Design: The Sensyne 60" portable phone tripod innovatively combines a selfie stick and tripod in a single, compact unit. Effortlessly switch between shooting modes for solo or group use. Its foldable design is as convenient as an umbrella, making it perfect for on-the-go content creators.

Premium Build, Extensive Reach: The Sensyne 60" portable phone tripod boasts a premium aluminum alloy construction with a sleek piano baking paint finish. It's both robust and visually appealing. With six extendable sections, it reaches a full 60" height, perfect for eye-level portraits and captivating aerial views.

Versatile Phone Holder for Any Angle: The Sensyne tripod features a 360° rotating phone holder that effortlessly adjusts to accommodate smartphones ranging from 2.3" to 3.9" in width. Its non-slip silicone pads keep your device secure while enabling you to find the ideal shooting angle for your photos and videos.

Multifunctional Selfie Stick Tripod: The Sensyne tripod is your go-to tool for both indoor and outdoor photography needs, seamlessly transitioning between selfie stick and tripod modes. Whether you're capturing video content, group photos, vlogs, adventures, family memories, video calls, online meetings, or any other creative pursuit, this versatile accessory has got you covered.

Effortless Remote Shutter Control: The Sensyne tripod includes a detachable Bluetooth remote shutter, allowing you to easily capture stunning photos and videos from a distance using your smartphone. You'll find the remote trigger conveniently nestled in the tripod's leg for a convenient experience. Additionally, it seamlessly pairs with both iOS and Android systems, ensuring a smooth operation.

Versatile All in 1 Innovation Design & Tripod Stand Mode Free Your Hands Enjoy Your Life Every moment with the one you beloved is worthy of recording even if it's not on a special day.

The lengthy Selfie Stick Will Ever Blow Your Mind Easily adjust pole from 13” to 60” to get perfect angles and shots. Bring all beauty in your eyes home and share your happiness and joy with your friends and family
Extremely Flexible for Multi-scene Uses Take you to relive the days when we were crazy about taking photo stickers Sensyne do anything we can, let you enjoy your life!
Considerate Details Design Free Hassle for you to explore the world
Compatible with IOS & Android Systems Pocket-size Easily Removable Wireless Connection
A Great Addition to Your Journey ! Sensyne portable selfie stick tripod allows you to explore every corner of the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable, Affordable, and Adorable!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this tripod! I bought this to bring with me to work to film social media content with as well as product photography for my Etsy shop - It's super lightweight but has no issues with stability, and it fits in my purse easily to bring with me anywhere. The color is a huge bonus as almost everything I own is pink 🤣 Highly highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Way better than I thought it would be! I ordered at a quick glance for the pricing & color.. it stretches out like 1-2ft above me (im 5’4) and is super compact, fits in my purse. It is SO worth the purchase. You can tilt your phone when it’s set up, which I didn’t think it would do! Also has a sturdy tripod bottom. I’ll definitely repurchase in the future or gift to my friends who are content creators as well, or just enjoy taking pics/videos! 10/10 recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent purchase! So easy to use & put away. Size is a little big if you were looking for something smaller

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Telescoping Tripod Great Feature
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have used this several times. I like how it folds up into a 12" tube. It's easy to pack. I'm a little concerned about the durability of the phone clamp. there is no way of replacing if it breaks. So use care. Other wise good product for the money. I have not used the remote -- so that's why I did not give it a rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this tri pod and how it isn’t too in your face like others! the portability is perfect for people always on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t really know if this would work, but it was perfect. I was able to set my phone up to record my band’s performance. It’s lightweight, doesn’t take up much space, easy to connect the remote with Bluetooth. There was a little wind they could have blown it over, but we just set a few rocks on the base, so no issues.The only thing I wish it would do is indicate on the remote somehow whether video is recording - I couldn’t see very well on my phone if it’s on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy. Well designed easy to use. Paired up to phone with no glitches. Both daughters loved it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more asking a stranger to take a picture.
reviews.reviewText: So I ordered this for DYI photo shoot and it did what its was supposed to do. I now use this every day to capture videos for cooking, working out, etc.. I also use it for my business to record videos of making wigs and it has been the best thing I have bought recently from Amazon. Definitely recommend this product. I’m 5’7 and it's fine for height.
Easily connects via bluetooth. Good for taking selfies. tripod is good

This selfie stick tripod is good for professionals. I thought I can detach the selfie stick from tripod but I wouldn't be able to detach. I had to hold the whole tripod which I felt bit heavy while taking a selfie. Otherwise it looks strong and sturdy.
